title: 58: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 10 (FANTASY SUITES)
itunes:title: 58: Bachelorette Recap: Episode 10 (FANTASY SUITES)
description:
It’s going down...downtown, Broads! The Broads discuss the windmill answer, how Tyler keeps getting more perfect, the steaminess of it all, Jed’s tiny guitar, Bekah and Jess debate the Luke “conversation”, Hannah’s triumphs, and much more! 
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
